content:
ContentKeyType ContentKeyType Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.dll

Specifies the type of a content key.

Edit

In this Article

public enum ContentKeyTypePublic Enum ContentKeyType

Fields

CommonEncryption CommonEncryption

Specifies a content key for common encryption.
CommonEncryptionCbcs CommonEncryptionCbcs

Specifies a content key for common encryption with cbcs.
ConfigurationEncryption ConfigurationEncryption

Specifies a content key for configuration encryption.
EnvelopeEncryption EnvelopeEncryption

Specifies a content key for Envelope encryption. Only used internally.
FairPlayASk FairPlayASk

Application Secret key for FairPlay.
FairPlayPfxPassword FairPlayPfxPassword

Password for FairPlay application certificate.
StorageEncryption StorageEncryption

Specifies a content key for storage encryption.
UrlEncryption UrlEncryption

Specifies a content key for url encryption. Only used internally.
